headline.print_headline: Bulls Win 5th in a Row, Beat Wizards 96-78
headline.main: Bulls Win 5th in a Row, Beat Wizards 96-78

docs.snippet: D.J. Augustin scored 25 points Saturday night, Joakim Noah had 21 points and 12 rebounds, and the Chicago Bulls turned a possible first-round playoff preview into a laugher, never trailing in a 96-78 win over the Washington Wizards...
docs.lead_paragraph: D.J. Augustin scored 25 points Saturday night, Joakim Noah had 21 points and 12 rebounds, and the Chicago Bulls turned a possible first-round playoff preview into a laugher, never trailing in a 96-78 win over the Washington Wizards

headline.print_headline: 'TeamCasts' Make Debut in Final Four Coverage
headline.main: 'TeamCasts' Make Debut in Final Four Coverage

docs.snippet: The sideline reporter wrapped up her segment during the Final Four game with a hearty: "We bleed blue, and in Ollie we trust!"...
docs.lead_paragraph: The sideline reporter wrapped up her segment during the Final Four game with a hearty: "We bleed blue, and in Ollie we trust!"

docs.snippet: Peter Matthiessen, a rich man's son who spurned a life of leisure and embarked on extraordinary physical and spiritual quests while producing such acclaimed books as "The Snow Leopard" and "At Play in the Fields of the Lord," died Saturday. He was...
docs.lead_paragraph: Peter Matthiessen, a rich man's son who spurned a life of leisure and embarked on extraordinary physical and spiritual quests while producing such acclaimed books as "The Snow Leopard" and "At Play in the Fields of the Lord," died Saturday. He was 86.

headline.print_headline: Role Players Key UConn's 63-53 Win Over Florida
headline.main: Role Players Key UConn's 63-53 Win Over Florida

docs.snippet: Connecticut's 2011 national championship has been characterized as a one-man effort by Kemba Walker. Good as he was, he still needed help from teammates Jeremy Lamb, Alex Oriakhi and Shabazz Napier....
docs.lead_paragraph: Connecticut's 2011 national championship has been characterized as a one-man effort by Kemba Walker. Good as he was, he still needed help from teammates Jeremy Lamb, Alex Oriakhi and Shabazz Napier.

headline.print_headline: FINALS WATCH: Howard Backs Teammate's Gators
headline.main: FINALS WATCH: Howard Backs Teammate's Gators

docs.snippet: Dwight Howard showed some love for the alma mater of Houston Rockets teammate Chandler Parsons....

headline.print_headline: Guards Flounder, Florida Falls in Final Four
headline.main: Guards Flounder, Florida Falls in Final Four

docs.snippet: With the game winding down and his team facing a double-digit deficit, Florida coach Billy Donovan turned to an NCAA official sitting courtside and jokingly asked if they could start over....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the game winding down and his team facing a double-digit deficit, Florida coach Billy Donovan turned to an NCAA official sitting courtside and jokingly asked if they could start over.

headline.print_headline: Europeans Petkovic and Cepelova Make Charleston Final
headline.main: Europeans Petkovic and Cepelova Make Charleston Final

docs.snippet: Bosnian-born German Andrea Petkovic outlasted rising Canadian star Eugenie Bouchard in a Family Circle Cup semi-final on Saturday to earn a spot in a WTA final for the eighth time....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bosnian-born German Andrea Petkovic outlasted rising Canadian star Eugenie Bouchard in a Family Circle Cup semi-final on Saturday to earn a spot in a WTA final for the eighth time.

headline.print_headline: Snowden, Greenwald Urge Caution of Wider Government Monitoring at Amnesty Event
headline.main: Snowden, Greenwald Urge Caution of Wider Government Monitoring at Amnesty Event

docs.snippet: Edward Snowden and reporter Glenn Greenwald, who brought to light the whistleblower's leaks about mass U.S. government surveillance last year, appeared together via video link from opposite ends of the earth on Saturday for what was believed to be...
docs.lead_paragraph: Edward Snowden and reporter Glenn Greenwald, who brought to light the whistleblower's leaks about mass U.S. government surveillance last year, appeared together via video link from opposite ends of the earth on Saturday for what was believed to be the first time since Snowden sought asylum in Russia.

headline.print_headline: Kuznetsov's SO Goal Lifts Capitals Over Isles 4-3
headline.main: Kuznetsov's SO Goal Lifts Capitals Over Isles 4-3

docs.snippet: Evgeny Kuznetsov scored in regulation and had the only goal in the shootout to lift the Capitals to a 4-3 win over the New York Islanders on Saturday and keep Washington's playoff hopes alive....
docs.lead_paragraph: Evgeny Kuznetsov scored in regulation and had the only goal in the shootout to lift the Capitals to a 4-3 win over the New York Islanders on Saturday and keep Washington's playoff hopes alive.

headline.print_headline: State TV: Mali President Names New Prime Minister
